channel.title: Need help asap! hoping to get server up today!
channel.description: Hi, I have a very very tricky server problem. Okay well me and my friend was starting a server, but we need some help on one part, well here it is: My friend (hoster-Owner) can connect to the server using the server ip we set for it. Skillerscape.no-ip.biz, and well this is the prblem he can conect using no-ip but no one else can This is relly tricky and we have been wokring on it for the past few days Oh and we have also done everything Portforward classpath and path no-ip all of this was done absolutely rite but hes the only one that can connect Plz Help us, ModMan33[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2009, 07:53:05 pm[/size][hr]Sorry about that umm he can only connect wit 0.0.0.0 plz help!

item.title: Need help asap! hoping to get server up today!
item.dc:creator: @_Dro †Dro†
item.description:
@_Dro wrote:

yeah, was just making sure that he knew that ;D

jest help me, go to link in my sig. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Need help asap! hoping to get server up today!
item.dc:creator: @Jesta1 Jesta
item.description:
@Jesta1 wrote:

[quote="†Dro†, post:2, topic:267007"]well, does he have router or modem? if router then you need to portforward.
and hoster, dont need to use ip, he can leave the ip spot blank.[/quote]Yeah, the hoster can just leave the server IP spot blank and it will connect to his localhost. But for your problem, i would say you probably need to portforward. I hate portforwarding and it can be easy or hard… Just go to www.portforward.com and find the tutorial for your router. But pay attention to the tutorial and do EXACTLY what it tells you to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help asap! hoping to get server up today!

item.title: Need help asap! hoping to get server up today!
item.dc:creator: @MODMAN33 MODMAN33
item.description:
@MODMAN33 wrote:

Hi,
I have a very very tricky server problem.
Okay well me and my friend was starting a server, but we need some help on one part,
well here it is: My friend (hoster-Owner) can connect to the server using the server ip we set for it. Skillerscape.no-ip.biz,
and well this is the prblem he can conect using no-ip but no one else can
This is relly tricky and we have been wokring on it for the past few days
Oh and we have also done everything Portforward classpath and path no-ip all of this was done absolutely rite but
hes the only one that can connect
Plz Help us,
ModMan33[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2009, 07:53:05 pm[/size][hr]Sorry about that umm he can only connect wit 0.0.0.0 plz help!
